description: Correct tool selection: web_fetch for simple pages, Playwright for interactive/protected ones.
context: Agent learned to check web_fetch first (fast, low overhead). If 403/Cloudflare, fall back to Playwright with anti-detection. Not everything needs browser.
reproduction:
1. Identify scraping need
2. Try web_fetch first
3. If success → done
4. If 403/empty → try Playwright with stealth
5. Document which sites need which approach
notes: Tool selection hierarchy: simplest first, escalate on failure. web_fetch handles 70% of cases. Browser is sledgehammer — use when needed, not by default.
